approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: To create a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide V-KYC team leads with access to V-KYC recordings.
Enable easy retrieval of recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the V-KYC team has to request the IT data server team to provide the recordings. The VKYC recordings are present at LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server which are retrieved basis the manual request.

requirements.description: A portal/Dashboard to be created and access for that will be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager)
All the recordings of VKYC shall be made available on this portal and will be fetched as and when required.
The recording shall be available date, month wise
The recording shall be visible if searched by LAN
An option for users to upload an Excel or text file will be there. This file will allow employees to list up to 50 Lan IDs for which they require video recordings.
Once the file is uploaded, the system will trigger a call to backend API to process the request.
The results will be displayed on the screen in a tabular format, accompanied by a "Download All" option.
The table pagination will display only 10 records at a time, and similarly only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
File upload will be csv/txt file.
Post clicking the LAN the recording download shall start
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: User authentication and authorization for Team Leads and Process Managers.
Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality via file upload (CSV/TXT) with a maximum of 50 LAN IDs.
Display of results in a tabular format with pagination (10 records per page).
Download all option for the displayed records.
Backend API integration for processing the file upload and retrieving recordings.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal restricted to Team Leaders and Process Managers.
Performance: System should handle the file upload and download efficiently.
success_criteria: V-KYC team leads can access and download recordings independently.
Recordings are easily searchable and filterable.
Reduced dependency on IT for recording retrieval.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
Maximum 50 LAN IDs per file upload.
Pagination limited to 10 records per page.
assumptions: The IT team will provide necessary access to the NFS server.
The backend API for retrieving recordings will be available.
The existing infrastructure can support the portal and its functionalities.
risks: Security risks related to unauthorized access.
Integration issues with the backend API.
Data storage limitations on the NFS server.

recommendations: Define specific performance metrics for bulk download.
Implement robust security measures to protect recording access.
Provide detailed error handling and logging for API integration.

identified_gaps: Detailed reporting requirements are not defined.
Specific interface changes or testing requirements are not mentioned.
recommendations_for_completion: Define reporting requirements (e.g., audit logs, download statistics).
Specify interface changes and testing scenarios.
